review.rating: We had a very nice stay here
review.comment_positive: Very nice and new hotel, with all the necessary amenities. We had very comfy bed with soft mattress, spacious room with large bathroom and full glass shower cabin, with enough hot water available, even when taking late evening shower. Sockets are comfortably located all around the room, which is rarely met in Vietnamese hotels. Room has a good soundproof, enough to have a quiet time and peaceful sleep. Very helpful and friendly staff. Will be back soon and surely will recommend this place to our friends. Thank you, hotel, for a nice stay ğŸŒº
